moves.1. e4: Hi everyone, this match was against the highest rated player in my 1700-1800 mini-tournament, in fact just before the draw offer his rating was 1851.  This was a strange game of which again I was struck down by passivitis and I found myself exchanging my opponent's horsies which were threatening to run riot in my position for both my bishops.  I was very lucky to draw this game, how lucky only you the jury can tell me.  I kick off with e4 and my opponent gives me the Sicilian (c5).
moves.1... c5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5: 3. Bb5 - I go for the Nimzovich-Rossolimo attack.
moves.13... Rd8 14. Bc2 Be6 15. Qxd6 Rxd6: 15. ....... Rxd6 - now we have a queen trade.  I now complete my development with 16. Be3.
moves.16. Be3 Rdd8 17. Rad1 h6 18. Rxd8+ Rxd8: 18. ........ Rxd8 - now we have a rook trade.
moves.20... Nd7 21. Nd2: 21. Nd2 - you would not think I would be struck down by passivitis from here would you ........
moves.21... Nd4: 21. ......... Nd4 - think again!  Look how powerful that horsie on d4 looks.
moves.22. b4: 22. b4 - looked good at the time, trying to prevent Nc5 but my opponent has ways of working his knight into my position.
moves.26. Nc1 Nd5: 26. ...... Nd5 - don't those horsies look nasty!  I now decide to give up Fou Lenoir for one of them.
moves.27. Bxd4 exd4: 27. ....... exd4 - although black's d pawn is passed at least it is an isolani.
moves.28. Bb3 Be6 29. Bxd5 Bxd5: 29. .......... Bxd5 - this time Fou Leblanc departs for the remaining horsies.  2 knights against two bishops is a disadvantage I am told in an endgame.  How much of a disadvantage I am about to find out.
moves.30. Nd3 Ke7 31. Kf1: 31. Kf1 - Henry must centralise himself as much as he can.
moves.34. Kd1 Kd6 35. Kc2: 35. Kc2 - to try and prevent the enemy king from snatching off my a pawn.
moves.35... g5 36. g4: 36. g4 - I try and close off one bishop's diagonals as much as possible.
moves.36... Ke7: 36. ...... Ke7 - a king retreat, mmm, this retreat gives me something to consider ........
moves.37. Kb2: 37. Kb2 - a DRAW OFFER! Surprisingly my opponent accepts it.  Was this good draw offer bad acceptance or the other way round.  You the jury decide.
